text: Natalia Lach-Lachowicz (18 April 1937 – 12 August 2022), known as Natalia LL, was a Polish artist. Her works were usually painted portraits, photography, drawings, performance and video art. She was a well known avant garde image making artist in Poland. In 1970 she co-founded PERMAFO, an artists' group and gallery. She worked at the University of Fine Arts in Poznań from 2004 to 2013. Natalia LL died on 12 August 2022 in Poznań, Poland at the age of 85.Natalia LL nie żyje ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Polish artists Category:People from Poznań
title: Natalia LL
